text.more: Template for this visualization provided by the Oxford Internet Institute's Interactive Visualizations project: https://blogs.oii.ox.ac.uk/vis/
text.intro: This network was created by 'projecting' the bipartite network of people and texts onto just texts alone. Connections are present when two texts name the same set of people.
text.title: Texts by Co-occurring Name Mentions 1475-1700

legend.edgeLabel: Connections between texts that share more than two people
legend.nodeLabel: A Single Text (must have at least one dedication)
